verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Tell<WH1696> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> to separate<WH5144> themselves from the holy things<WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which they make holy<WH6944> to me,<WH2490> and that they not profane my holy<WH6944> name.<WH8034> I am Yahweh.<WH3068>

"Tell<WH559> them,<WH2233> 'If anyone of all your seed throughout your generations<WH1755> approaches the holy things,<WH6944> which the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> make holy<WH6942> to Yahweh,<WH3068> having his uncleanness<WH2932> on him,<WH5315> that soul shall be cut off<WH3772> from before me.<WH3068> I am Yahweh.

<WH2233>"'Whoever of the seed of Aaron<WH175> is a leper<WH6879> or has an issue;<WH2100> he shall not eat<WH398> of the holy things,<WH6944> until he is clean.<WH2891> Whoever touches<WH5060> anything that is unclean<WH2931> by the dead,<WH5315> or a man<WH376> whose seed<WH2233> goes from him;<WH3318>
or whoever<WH376> touches<WH5060> any creeping thing,<WH8318> whereby he may be made unclean,<WH2930> or a man<WH120> of whom he may take uncleanness,<WH2930> whatever uncleanness he has;<WH2932>

the person<WH5315> that touches any such shall be unclean<WH2930> until the evening,<WH6153> and shall not eat<WH398> of the holy things,<WH6944> unless<WH518> he bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> in water.<WH4325>
When the sun<WH8121> is down,<WH935> he shall be clean;<WH2891> and afterward<WH310> he shall eat<WH398> of the holy things,<WH6944> because it is his bread.
That which dies of itself,<WH5038> or is torn<WH2966> by animals,<WH398> he shall not eat, defiling himself by it.<WH3068> I am Yahweh.
<WH5375>"'They shall therefore follow my requirements, lest they bear sin<WH2399> for it,<WH4191> and die therein,<WH2490> if they profane it.<WH3068> I am Yahweh who sanctifies them.<WH6942>
<WH2114>"'No stranger shall eat<WH398> of the holy thing:<WH6944> a foreigner<WH2114> living with the priests,<WH3548> or a hired servant,<WH7916> shall not eat<WH398> of the holy thing.<WH6944>
But if a priest<WH3548> buys<WH7069> a slave,<WH3701> purchased by his money, he shall eat<WH398> of it;<WH3211> and such as are born in his house,<WH1004> they shall eat of his bread.<WH398>
If a priest<WH3548>'s daughter<WH1323> is married to an outsider,<WH398> she shall not eat of the heave offering<WH8641> of the holy things.<WH6944>

But if a priest<WH3548>'s daughter<WH1323> is a widow,<WH490> or divorced,<WH1644> and has no child,<WH2233> and has returned<WH7725> to her father<WH1>'s house,<WH1004> as in her youth,<WH5271> she may eat<WH398> of her father<WH1>'s bread:<WH2114> but no stranger shall eat any of it.<WH398>

<WH376>"'If a man eats<WH398> something<WH6944> holy unwittingly,<WH7684> then he shall add<WH3254> the fifth<WH2549> part of its value to it,<WH5414> and shall give the holy thing<WH6944> to the priest.<WH3548>
The priests shall not profane<WH2490> the holy things<WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which they offer<WH7311> to Yahweh,<WH3068>
and so cause them to bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> that brings guilt,<WH819> when they eat<WH398> their holy things:<WH6944> for I am Yahweh<WH3068> who sanctifies them.<WH6942>'"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to Aaron,<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> and to all the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them,<WH376> 'Whoever is of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> or of the foreigners<WH1616> in Israel,<WH3478> who offers<WH7126> his offering,<WH7133> whether it be any of their vows,<WH5088> or any of their freewill offerings,<WH5071> which they offer<WH7126> to Yahweh<WH3068> for a burnt offering;<WH5930>
that you may be accepted,<WH7522> you shall offer a male<WH2145> without blemish,<WH8549> of the bulls,<WH1241> of the sheep,<WH3775> or of the goats.<WH5795>
But whatever has a blemish,<WH3971> that you shall not offer:<WH7126> for it shall not be acceptable for you.<WH7522>

Whoever<WH376> offers<WH7126> a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> to Yahweh<WH3068> to accomplish<WH6381> a vow,<WH5088> or for a freewill offering,<WH5071> of the herd<WH1241> or of the flock,<WH6629> it shall be perfect<WH8549> to be accepted;<WH7522> no blemish shall be therein.<WH3971>

Blind,<WH5788> injured,<WH2782> maimed,<WH2782> having a wart,<WH3217> festering,<WH1618> or having a running sore,<WH2990> you shall not offer<WH7126> these to Yahweh,<WH3068> nor make<WH5414> an offering by fire<WH801> of them on the altar<WH4196> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

Either a bull<WH7794> or a lamb<WH7716> that has any deformity<WH8311> or lacking in his parts,<WH7038> that you may offer<WH6213> for a freewill offering;<WH5071> but for a vow<WH5088> it shall not be accepted.<WH7521>
That which has its testicles bruised,<WH4600> crushed,<WH3807> broken,<WH5423> or cut,<WH3772> you shall not offer<WH7126> to Yahweh;<WH3068> neither shall you do<WH6213> thus in your land.<WH776>

Neither shall you offer<WH7126> the bread<WH3899> of your God<WH430> from the hand<WH3027> of a foreigner<WH5236> of any of these;<WH4893> because their corruption is in them.<WH3971> There is a blemish in them.<WH7521> They shall not be accepted for you.'"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"When a bull,<WH7794> or a sheep,<WH3775> or a goat,<WH5795> is born,<WH7651> then it shall remain seven days<WH3117> with its mother;<WH517> and from the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> and thenceforth<WH1973> it shall be accepted<WH7521> for the offering<WH7133> of an offering<WH7133> made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
Whether it is a cow<WH7794> or ewe,<WH7716> you shall not kill<WH7819> it and its young<WH1121> both in one<WH259> day.<WH3117>
"When you sacrifice<WH2077> a sacrifice<WH2077> of thanksgiving<WH8426> to Yahweh,<WH3068> you shall sacrifice<WH2077> it so that you may be accepted.<WH7522>
It shall be eaten<WH398> on the same day;<WH3117> you shall leave<WH3498> none of it until the morning.<WH1242> I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
"Therefore you shall keep<WH8104> my commandments,<WH4687> and do<WH6213> them.<WH3068> I am Yahweh.
You shall not profane<WH2490> my holy<WH6944> name,<WH8034> but I will be made holy<WH6942> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> I am Yahweh<WH3068> who makes you holy,<WH6942>
who brought you out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> to be your God.<WH430> I am Yahweh.<WH3068>"
